feed.title: Peppermint Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Peppermint: 0.4.5
entry.content:
• Fix port 465 bug for smtp outbounds
  • Options to Delete and verify smtp outbound email settings
  • Move Ticket based html content ingested via imap into a iframe
  • small ui tweaks
  • improvement to global search

entry.title: New release for Peppermint: 0.4.6
entry.content:
• support for client user registration
  • bug fix for deleting clients
  • UI tweaks & fixes

entry.title: New release for Peppermint: 0.4.7
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Update README.md by @potts99 in https://github.com/Peppermint-Lab/peppermint/pull/256
  • Fix Unassigned ticket call to correct API endpoint by @xcassanello in https://github.com/Peppermint-Lab/peppermint/pull/255
  • main to next align by @potts99 in https://github.com/Peppermint-Lab/peppermint/pull/263
  • 0.4.7 by @potts99 in https://github.com/Peppermint-Lab/peppermint/pull/264
  • Update main.yml by @potts99 in https://github.com/Peppermint-Lab/peppermint/pull/265
  • fix: ticket title placement by @potts99 in https://github.com/Peppermint-Lab/peppermint/pull/299
  • next by @potts99 in https://github.com/Peppermint-Lab/peppermint/pull/300
  • fix: imap error by @potts99 in https://github.com/Peppermint-Lab/peppermint/pull/301
  • fixes#307 require atleast one admin by @Jatin-MYST in https://github.com/Peppermint-Lab/peppermint/pull/313
  • FIX Typo in Admin Settings > Email Queues #309 by @Kidji42 in https://github.com/Peppermint-Lab/peppermint/pull/314
  • Use Number field instead of id field by @Jatin-MYST in https://github.com/Peppermint-Lab/peppermint/pull/312
  • Add missing keys to english language by @cfpwastaken in https://github.com/Peppermint-Lab/peppermint/pull/308
  • feat(i18n): turkish language added by @victorioustr in https://github.com/Peppermint-Lab/peppermint/pull/306
  • Updated norwegian locale translation by @oyvindremme in https://github.com/Peppermint-Lab/peppermint/pull/317
  • feat(i18n): hungarian language added by @keszi000 in https://github.com/Peppermint-Lab/peppermint/pull/320

New Contributors

  • @xcassanello made their first contribution in https://github.com/Peppermint-Lab/peppermint/pull/255
  • @Jatin-MYST made their first contribution in https://github.com/Peppermint-Lab/peppermint/pull/313
  • @Kidji42 made their first contribution in https://github.com/Peppermint-Lab/peppermint/pull/314
  • @cfpwastaken made their first contribution in https://github.com/Peppermint-Lab/peppermint/pull/308
  • @victorioustr made their first contribution in https://github.com/Peppermint-Lab/peppermint/pull/306
  • @oyvindremme made their first contribution in https://github.com/Peppermint-Lab/peppermint/pull/317
  • @keszi000 made their first contribution in https://github.com/Peppermint-Lab/peppermint/pull/320

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Peppermint-Lab/peppermint/compare/0.4.6...0.4.7

entry.title: New release for Peppermint: 0.4.8
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add Thai language in i18n by @TinnerKun in https://github.com/Peppermint-Lab/peppermint/pull/329
  • fix: bullet point not rendering
  • fix: show client
  • feat: createdby
